Light Up A Life
{!Contact.FirstName}
On 20th December all Challengers from 2011 in Coventry, Warwickshire and Solihull will be meeting for a Christmas reunion. If you love Christmas, music, being creative or just generally making people smile then this is the day for you.
We'll be meeting at the beginning of the day for a catch up then heading off to different Christmas partners to make people smile and collect Christmas wishes. When that's all done, we'll link up again for mince pies, music and a final send off.
The Details of where to be when are... When: Tuesday 20th December Time: 9.30am-4.30pm Where: St Peters Centre, Coventry, CV1 5NP
This is your first chance since summer to meet up with all your team or wave and catch up on what you've been up to. You can also bring any friends along with you who might like to come (between the age of 14 & 19). Don't miss out, visit The Challenge Society website (www.thechallengesociety.org) to register your attendance or follow this link and log in http://www.thechallengesociety.org/events.php/701C0000000gik0IAA/light-up-a-life?action=detail&id=701C0000000gik0IAA
If you haven’t received your website log in or have any questions then contact your Challenge Link…

Travel Instructions:
By Train: From Coventry Railway Station then you can get a taxi or bus but if you decide to walk we are approximately 1 mile away. Make your way to Coventry City centre and follow the walking directions below.
By Bus: Number 17 or 27 from Coventry Railway Station to Pool Meadow, then number 34 from Pool Meadow (destination Walsgrave Hospital) you will need the 2nd stop, cross the road into Vine Street, Charles Street is on your left.
By Car: M6 Junction 3
From A444 take 3rd Exit on to Binley Road
Through traffic lights on to Sky Blue Way
3rd Exit keeping into right hand lane on to Ringway Whitefriers
Drive along Ringway Whitefriers
Exit at Junction 2 Ringway Swanswell( A4053)
Take the 3rd exit to Primrose Hill Street
Drive along Primrose Hill Street
Straight through the traffic lights leading into Victoria Street and King William St
From the traffic lights take the 2nd turning on the right into Canterbury Street
Then 1st right into Charles Street
M42 Junction 6 From A45 turn into A4114 turn
Then turn left onto the ring road & drive along ring road to Ringway Saint Nicholas (A4053 )
Exit at Junction 2 Ringway Swanswell (A4053)
Take the 3rd exit to Primrose Hill Street
Drive along Primrose Hill Street
Straight through the traffic lights leading into Victoria Street and King William St
From the traffic lights take the 2nd turning on the right into Canterbury Street
1st right into Charles Street
Walking from the City Centre: From Broadgate walk down Trinity Street towards Millennium Place. Carry straight on past the Swanswell Park, over the traffic lights into Primrose Hill Street. Take the 1st right into Vine Street then 1st left into Charles Street.
See you there.
